p:
Afterwards, callus was transmitted to a fresh medium with the same growth regulators for regeneration, and after 12 days, the percentages of plantlets were counted as following formula:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{Regenertion}=\frac{\mathrm{Number}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{plantlet}}{\mathrm{Total}\ \mathrm{number}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{calluses}}\times 100 $$\end{document}
Regenertion =
Number of plantlet Total number of calluses
Ã— 100
